issue.title: [CF 250] Group Visibility
issue.body:
Hi

Right now we have group visibility based on Primary spec,secondary spec, talent speciliation.
Is it also possible to add instance ?
for example, for my druid, in my tanking spec, I like to have a barGroup visible when I am in bear and another barGroup visible when I am in Cat form.

Thanks in advance for such a usefull and good addon.


> Posted by CurseForge user nima_m | Imported from CurseForge issue #250 | Raw
